price: Ampa sε Yɛdii kan ne Adam yεε apam na ne werε frii, Yɛanhunu sε na εyε no anidaaho (na εmaa no yεε asoᴐden).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
